examples.translation: the thieves stole my mother's bag

glosses: to play (produce music using a musical instrument; use a device to hear a recording)

examples.translation: I play the piano very well

glosses: to play (produce music; be played from a recording)

examples.translation: the phone was ringing when I entered the house
the doorbell rang while I was taking a shower
[He/She/It] rings the door(bell) always three times.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish چالمق (çalmak), from Proto-Turkic *čal- (“to knock (down), hit, agitate”).
